title: Strengthening Machine Learning Practical Competencies: 4C/ID Model-Based Training for Instructional Designers

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational learning theories and basic instructional design concepts
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can apply the four components of the 4C/ID model (learning goal decomposition, learning task design, supportive information provision, procedural information provision) to practical cases
Learners can select appropriate educational tools and strategies based on target learners' needs analysis
Learners can integrate learning theories, soft skills, and business communication competencies through instructional design projects
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
